snippet: The Conceptual giant On Kawara’s first full-dress retrospective is at the Guggenheim Museum.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Guggenheim Museum's retrospective of conceptual artist On Kawara.
lead_paragraph: The Conceptual giant On Kawara’s first full-dress retrospective is at the Guggenheim Museum.

headline.print_headline: A Life Captivated by the Wonder of Time
headline.seo: The Guggenheim Shows First On Kawara Retrospective
headline.main: A Life Captivated by the Wonder of Time
